get.summary: Get User Id From Farmer Id
get.description:
Get user ID from farmer ID by matching farmer's national_id with user's username.

Args:
    farmer_id: The ID of the farmer in the farmer table
    session: Database session dependency
    token: Authentication token dependency

Returns:
    Dictionary containing the user_id

Raises:
    HTTPException: If farmer not found, user not found, or other errors occur

Generate a comprehensive seed report.

Parameters:
- seed_id: Specific seed ID, or None for all seeds
- factory_id: Specific factory ID, or None for all factories

Returns:
- Aggregated report format with reports array and totals for all cases

The report includes:
- Total amount of seeds received from factory
- Total amount of seeds delivered to farmers
- Remaining seed count
- Financial calculations including profit margins

post.description:
Generate a comprehensive sugar report.

The report includes:
- AA: sum_sugar_received_factories
- BB: sum_sugar_delivered_farmers
- CC: remaining_sugar_in_contractor_storage (AA - BB)
- DD: sum_sugar_price_received_factory
- EE: sum_sugar_deposit_amount
- FF: remaining_sugar_balance_contractor (DD - EE)
- GG: total_sugar_due_farmers
- HH: remaining_sugar_due_farmers (GG - BB)
- JJ: total_sugar_amount_due_farmers
- KK: remaining_sugar_amount_due_farmers (JJ - EE)

post.description:
Generate a comprehensive factory financial report for all factory operations.

Returns:
- Aggregated report for all factories

The report includes:
- Total money received by factory
- Total farmers debt
- Total farmers cash payments
- Total farmers seed payments value
- Total farmers pesticide payments value
- Remaining farmers debt
- Remaining contractor balance

post.description:
Generate a comprehensive pesticide report for factory operations.

Parameters:
- pesticide_id: Specific pesticide ID, or None for all pesticides
- factory_id: Specific factory ID, or None for all factories

Returns:
- Aggregated report format with reports array and totals for all cases

The report includes:
- Received pesticide count from factory
- Pesticide delivered to farmers count
- Remaining pesticide count
- Total amount paid to factory for pesticides
- Total amount received from farmers for pesticides
- Contractor pesticide profit

get.description: Get farmers guarantee records by user ID where the farmer is either guarantor or being guaranteed

200.description: Farmers guarantees retrieved successfully for user

schema.title: Response Get Farmers Guarantees By User Farmers Guarantee By User  User Id  Get

patch.description: Set the guarantee_price to 0 for the specified farmers guarantee record

get.description:
Calculate the default guarantee price for a guaranteed farmer based on:
1. Total seed cost (sum of seed_amount * price from farmers_seed)
2. Total pesticide cost (sum of pesticide_amount * price from farmers_pesticide)
3. Total payments with payment_type = 1 (from farmers_payment)

Get farmers invoice with calculated fields:
A: remaining_receivable_payable_balance = C - E - F - G - H
B: total_weight (pure_weight sum)
C: pure_payable (pure_payable sum)
D: newest_date (latest date)
E: total_farmers_price (payments sum)
F: total_seed_cost (seed_amount * price sum)
G: total_pesticide_cost (pesticide_amount * price sum)
H: one_percent_deduction (C * 0.01)
M: total_guarantee_price (guarantee_price sum)

parameters.name: sort_by

schema.description: Sort field (A-M or any calculated field)
schema.title: Sort By

parameters.description: Sort field (A-M or any calculated field)

parameters.name: crop_year_id

schema.description: Filter by specific crop year ID (defaults to latest if not provided)
schema.title: Crop Year Id

parameters.description: Filter by specific crop year ID (defaults to latest if not provided)

post.description:
Process payment for a farmer after validating conditions:
1. Check if farmer has any invoice records for the crop year
2. Validate that remaining_receivable_payable_balance is zero
3. Validate that total_guarantee_price is zero
4. Ensure total_weight is not zero
5. Mark farmer as paid if all conditions are met
